original: @71a * // tsandra pa'i aun la sogs pa'i 'grel pa bzhugs /
analyzed: @71a * // tsandra pa'i aun la sogs pa'i 'grel pa bzhugs /
translated: The commentary on Candra's grammar and so forth.

original: # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tsandra syo n'a der britti n'a ma /
analyzed: tsandra syo n'a der britti n'a ma /
translated: Candrasyounāderbrīti-nāma.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: tsandra pa'i aun la sogs pa'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: tsandra pa'i aun la sogs pa'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The commentary on Candra's grammar and so forth called The Explanation.

original: 'jam mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the protector Mañjuśrī.

original: kri b'a p'a dzi mi sva di s'a dhi aa shu rnams las au na'o //
analyzed: kri b'a p'a dzi mi sva di s'a dhi aa shu rnams las au na'o //
translated: From kriyā, pāja, mi, svādhi, aśu, unā.

original: du krinya byed pa la'o //🔽du yig du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //
analyzed: du krinya byed pa la'o // du yig du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //
translated: Dvi is for the causative.🔽The letter du is for the causative affix ktra from the meaning of the sign.

original: nya yig krinya las rgyu dang ngang tshul dang rjes su mthun pa rnams la'o zhes sogs rtags kyi don te //
analyzed: nya yig krinya las rgyu dang ngang tshul dang rjes su mthun pa rnams la'o zhes sogs rtags kyi don te //
translated: The letter nya is for the causative affix kta from the meaning of the sign.

original: ai na b'i ba 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: ai na b'i ba 'gro ba la'o //
translated: Ina is for going.

original: p'a btung ba la'o //
analyzed: p'a btung ba la'o //
translated: Pā is for drinking.

original: dzi rgyal ba la'o //
analyzed: dzi rgyal ba la'o //
translated: Ji is for victory.

original: du mi nya 'phen pa la'o //
analyzed: du mi nya 'phen pa la'o //
translated: Dumi is for throwing.

original: du yig du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don no //
analyzed: du yig du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don no //
translated: The letter du is for the causative affix ktra from the meaning of the sign.

original: nya yig nyid las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: nya yig nyid las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter nya is for the causative affix kta from the meaning of the sign.

original: sva da dang sva da ro myang ba la'o //
analyzed: sva da dang sva da ro myang ba la'o //
translated: Svādhi and svādar are for tasting.

original: r'a dha s'a dha yang dag par grub pa la'o //
analyzed: r'a dha s'a dha yang dag par grub pa la'o //
translated: Rādhasādhayati, “he causes to be accomplished.”

original: nga yig dha yig dag gi aa yig klog pa'i don no //
analyzed: nga yig dha yig dag gi aa yig klog pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of the letters ṅ and ḍh is the reading of the letter a.

original: aa sh'u khyab pa la'o //
analyzed: aa sh'u khyab pa la'o //
translated: Aśū, “pervasiveness.”

original: a'u yig snri s'ung au di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: a'u yig snri s'ung au di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The meaning of the letter ū is the sign of snṛsaṅg, “union.”

original: 'di @71b rnams las sgrub pa ni bya ba'i don las pha rol tu mang po la byed pa la zhes pa rjes su 'jug pa rnams la aun pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di @71b rnams las sgrub pa ni bya ba'i don las pha rol tu mang po la byed pa la zhes pa rjes su 'jug pa rnams la aun pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From among these, the suffix ū is added to the roots in the sense of action, in the sense of many, and in the sense of the other.

original: na yig a'at aee tsa'i don no //
analyzed: na yig a'at aee tsa'i don no //
translated: The letter na is the meaning of āt, “self.”

original: aa tsa'i 'o zhes pas a'a nyid do //
analyzed: aa tsa'i 'o zhes pas a'a nyid do //
translated: Since it is said that āt is a, it is a.

original: rik gi aan las ra la dag go zhes pas pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: rik gi aan las ra la dag go zhes pas pha rol nyid do //
translated: Since it is said that ra and la are from rik’s aṅ, it is the other.

original: re pha las aa yig brjod pa'i don no //
analyzed: re pha las aa yig brjod pa'i don no //
translated: The letter a is the meaning of the expression from reph.

original: don tsam la dang po'o zhes pas su'o //🔽su'i a'u yig su'i 'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: don tsam la dang po'o zhes pas su'o // su'i a'u yig su'i 'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: Since it is said that the first is in the sense of mere object, it is su.🔽The meaning of the sign of su’s ū is su’s.

original: sa sa dzu sha'i ru'o zhes pas sa yig gi ru nyid do //
analyzed: sa sa dzu sha'i ru'o zhes pas sa yig gi ru nyid do //
translated: Since it is said that sa’s is ru from saṃjūṣ, the letter sa is ru.

original: au yig aata las ha sha la'ang ru'i 'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: au yig aata las ha sha la'ang ru'i 'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The meaning of the sign of ū is ha śa la’s ru from aṭ.

original: re pha'i rdzogs pa la rnam par bcad pa'o yis thig la gnyis su 'gyur ro //🔽k'a ru: (shing bzo ba/)...shilp'a: a'a tu'i nal ma yin pa la yu ka'o zhes pas yu ka a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: re pha'i rdzogs pa la rnam par bcad pa'o yis thig la gnyis su 'gyur ro // k'a ru: (shing bzo ba/)...shilp'a: a'a tu'i nal ma yin pa la yu ka'o zhes pas yu ka a'a ga ma'o //
translated: In the perfection of Ba, the two are in the line.

original: au yig brjod pa'i don to //
analyzed: au yig brjod pa'i don to //
translated: In the perfection of Bha, the two are in the line.🔽In the perfection of Ma, the two are in the line.

original: ka yig spyir btang sgrub pa'i don to /🔽(/ rlung/)...b'a yu: pa m'i ra nam /

original: b'a yu: (bshang lam/)...p'a nam: aa tsa'i 'o zhes pas aee yig go //
analyzed: b'a yu: (bshang lam/)...p'a nam: aa tsa'i 'o zhes pas aee yig go //

original: ae tsa'i aay a'ab a'ay a'ab rnams so zhes pas a'a yar bsgyur ro //🔽dz'a yu: (sman/)...aoo sha dham m'a yu: (mkhris pa/)...pittam go snga ma las /

analyzed: au yig au di ta las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //

analyzed: shni bu dang shvakka min pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig go //

analyzed: rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can gyi 'ang med do zhes pas na yig gi na yig go //

analyzed: 'di rnams las de rnams nyid du lhag par byed pa rnams la nyu na pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Among these, the ones that are made to be predominant by those [vowels] become the other side.

original: nya yig nynita la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //🔽aa tsa'i 'o zhes pas ri yig gi a'a nyid do //
analyzed: nya yig nynita la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no // aa tsa'i 'o zhes pas ri yig gi a'a nyid do //

original: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid do //
translated: By raka's aṇ, the ra and la.

original: dang po'i gcig tshigs su ma ning las su aam dag gi zhes pas su dbyi'o /
analyzed: dang po'i gcig tshigs su ma ning las su aam dag gi zhes pas su dbyi'o /

original: (/ yu shing ngo/).../ d'a tu: k'ashtha nynita la'o zhes pas a'a nyid do /
analyzed: (/ yu shing ngo/).../ d'a tu: k'ashtha nynita la'o zhes pas a'a nyid do /

analyzed: (/ ri'i ngos/)...s'a nu gi ri pra de sha:...(ri'i phyogs gcig go //

original: des na nynita la'o zhes pas aa nyid do /
analyzed: des na nynita la'o zhes pas aa nyid do /
translated: Therefore, by nyā, the ā itself.

original: (/ pus mo/)...dz'a nu: (pus me'o/) / dzam gha sth'a nam ts'a tu sho bha nam ...(mdzes pa'o/) / ts'a tu:...(sgra mkhas pa/) sphu ta p'a d'a (gsal bar brjod pa'o/) / t'a lu ...(rkan/) ba da na ka de sha:...(kha'i phyogs gcig) / kima dza r'a dag las shr'i ai🔽na las so //

translated: བ་ད་ན་ཀ་དེ་ཤ༔་་་༼one side of the mouth༽🔽From kim and jara, śrī.

original: shr'i 'tsho ba la'o //
analyzed: shr'i 'tsho ba la'o //

original: ain b'i b'a 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: ain b'i b'a 'gro ba la'o //

analyzed: na yig aina'i yana'o zhes pas rtags don no //

analyzed: kim dz'a r'a dag las 'di dag las nyun pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From a ci, a.🔽From ri ka, aṇ, the affix ra.🔽From kim, the letter ma, the affix ma.🔽༼groin༽་་་ཀི་ཤའ་རུ༔་་་༼bow༽🔽 Translation: ཛའ་ནུ༔ ༼knees༽🔽ཛམ་གྷ་སཐའ་ནམ་ཙའ་ཏུ་ཤོ་བྷ་ནམ་་་་༼beautiful༽

translated: The syllable a is the meaning of “expression.”

original: ta nu rgyas pa la'o //
analyzed: ta nu rgyas pa la'o //
translated: The syllable nu is “increase.”

original: au yig au dita las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //
analyzed: au yig au dita las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //
translated: The syllable u is “again,” the meaning of the sign.

original: tu mardzo dag pa la'o //🔽tu yig tu 'gro ba las aa thu tsa'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: tu mardzo dag pa la'o // tu yig tu 'gro ba las aa thu tsa'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The syllable tu is “purification.”🔽The syllable tu is “going,” the meaning of the sign athuca.

original: aa yig ao di ta las so zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: aa yig ao di ta las so zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The syllable a is “from,” the meaning of the sign.

original: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
translated: The syllable śa is “lying down.”

original: nga yig lit ma yin pa la sh'ing gi ao ta'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: nga yig lit ma yin pa la sh'ing gi ao ta'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The syllable ṅa is “not,” the meaning of the sign of the syllable śa.

original: 'di rnams las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From among these, u becomes the other side.

original: bya ba'i don gyi ai ka'i aata aeng ngo //
analyzed: bya ba'i don gyi ai ka'i aata aeng ngo //
translated: The meaning of the action is the aṅ of ika.

original: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol lo //
analyzed: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol lo //
translated: The syllable ri is “from,” the meaning of the sign.🔽The syllable ra is “the two,” the meaning of the sign.🔽The syllable re is “the other side.”

original: re pha las aa yig brjod don no /
analyzed: re pha las aa yig brjod don no /
translated: The syllable pha is the meaning of the expression of the syllable a.

original: (/ khyo pho/) ...bha ru: bhartta ...(bdag po'o/) ma ru:...(myang ma/) nirdza lo de sha: ...(chu med pa'i yul lo/) / ta ru: (ljon shing ngo/).../ b'a da pa: tsa ru ...(sreg rdzas kyi snod do/) / ha be bye ni ta nu sha r'i re ...(lus so/) / dzha la'i
analyzed: (/ khyo pho/) ...bha ru: bhartta ...(bdag po'o/) ma ru:...(myang ma/) nirdza lo de sha: ...(chu med pa'i yul lo/) / ta ru: (ljon shing ngo/).../ b'a da pa: tsa ru ...(sreg rdzas kyi snod do/) / ha be bye ni ta nu sha r'i re ...(lus so/) / dzha la'i
translated: vāḍava, caru,🔽haveyenitanuśarīra,🔽jhalāṭi,

original: dza sha'o zhes pas sa yig gi da yig go //
analyzed: dza sha'o zhes pas sa yig gi da yig go //
translated: jhaśa,

original: n+yam ku la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas ku nyid kyis dza yig gi ga yig go //
analyzed: n+yam ku la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas ku nyid kyis dza yig gi ga yig go //
translated: nyamkula,🔽ku,

original: manggu: bakshi bi she sha: ...(chu bya'i khyad par ro/) / bya ba'i don gyi ai ka'i aata aeng ngo //
analyzed: manggu: bakshi bi she sha: ...(chu bya'i khyad par ro/) / bya ba'i don gyi ai ka'i aata aeng ngo //
translated: mangur, bakṣi viśeṣa,🔽bya,🔽e,🔽ay,

original: ae ca'i aay aab a'ay a'ab rnams so zhes pas aa yar bsgyur ro ;
analyzed: ae ca'i aay aab a'ay a'ab rnams so zhes pas aa yar bsgyur ro ;
translated: ay,🔽śayu,

original: / sha yu: aa dza ga ra: aan las so //
analyzed: / sha yu: aa dza ga ra: aan las so //
translated: ajagar,🔽an,🔽an,

original: aan ran zhes pa danda ka'i byings so //🔽aa yig klog don no //🔽aan las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aan ran zhes pa danda ka'i byings so // aa yig klog don no // aan las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The root is anara, which means “to go.”🔽The letter a is the meaning of “to read.”🔽From an, u becomes u.🔽

original: aa nu: su kshmam /
analyzed: aa nu: su kshmam /
translated: anu,🔽sukha,

original: so sor byed pa ni phyi ma'i don no //
analyzed: so sor byed pa ni phyi ma'i don no //
translated: The individual is for the sake of the future.

original: 'bru la ni ta 'o //
analyzed: 'bru la ni ta 'o //
translated: The syllable of the root is ta.

original: aa na'i byings kyi 'bru mngon par brjod pa la au pa rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa na'i byings kyi 'bru mngon par brjod pa la au pa rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The syllable of the root a becomes u in the presence of u.

original: na 'gro ba dbyangs ldan pa'o //🔽aa nu: shr'i hi zhes gnas pa gnyi ga la dza pa dza yig las aa yig phyung nas dza yig dzas la'o zhes pa'i rtags don mo //
analyzed: na 'gro ba dbyangs ldan pa'o // aa nu: shr'i hi zhes gnas pa gnyi ga la dza pa dza yig las aa yig phyung nas dza yig dzas la'o zhes pa'i rtags don mo //
translated: Na is the vowel a.

original: dzab la'o zhes pas ao nyid do //🔽ae nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: dzab la'o zhes pas ao nyid do // ae nyid kyang ngo //
translated: In the case of both anu and śrī, the letter a is extracted from the letters ja and ja, and the letter ja is changed to la.

original: ae tsa'i aay\ @73a * //
analyzed: ae tsa'i aay\ @73a * //
translated: The letter o is from ja and la.🔽The letter e is also from ja and la.

original: aab\ a'ay\ a'ab\ rnams so zhes pas aa ba ru bsgyur ba 'ang ngo //
analyzed: aab\ a'ay\ a'ab\ rnams so zhes pas aa ba ru bsgyur ba 'ang ngo //
translated: The letters ava are from e, ca, and a.

original: sa pa dzu sha'i zhes pas ru nyid do //
analyzed: sa pa dzu sha'i zhes pas ru nyid do //
translated: The letter ru is from sa and pa.

original: au yig aata las ha sha la'ang ru'i 'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: au yig aata las ha sha la'ang ru'i 'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter ha is from u and a.

original: re pha'i rdzogs pa la rnam par bcad pa'o zhes pas thig le gnyis su 'gyur ro /
analyzed: re pha'i rdzogs pa la rnam par bcad pa'o zhes pas thig le gnyis su 'gyur ro /
translated: The two bindus are from re and pha.

original: (/'bru rnams/)...aa na bo /
analyzed: (/'bru rnams/)...aa na bo /
translated: The syllables are from a to bha.

original: br'i ha ya:...('bru rnams/) pa ti aa si ba si tra pi ha ni ma ni aandi kandi bandi rnams las so //
analyzed: br'i ha ya:...('bru rnams/) pa ti aa si ba si tra pi ha ni ma ni aandi kandi bandi rnams las so //
translated: paṭi, asi, vasita, pihāna, mani, andika, kandi, and vandi.

original: pa ta 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: pa ta 'gro ba la'o //
translated: Paṭi means to go.

original: ta yig las aa yig klog pa'i don no //
analyzed: ta yig las aa yig klog pa'i don no //
translated: The letter ta is read as the letter a.

original: aa su 'phen pa la'o //
analyzed: aa su 'phen pa la'o //
translated: Asi means to throw.

original: au yig au dita las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: au yig au dita las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter u is from the word udita, meaning again.

original: ba sa nges par gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: ba sa nges par gnas pa la'o //
translated: Vasita means to abide.

original: aa yig brjod don no //
analyzed: aa yig brjod don no //
translated: The letter a is for the purpose of expression.

original: tra p'u sha ngo tsha ba la'o //
analyzed: tra p'u sha ngo tsha ba la'o //
translated: Trāpuṣya means shame.

original: sha yig bha ti sogs dang sha 'gro ba las aang ngo zhes pa'i rtags kyi don no //
analyzed: sha yig bha ti sogs dang sha 'gro ba las aang ngo zhes pa'i rtags kyi don no //
translated: The letter śa is from the words bhati and so on, and śa means to go.

original: a'u yig sbri s'ung a'u ngita las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: a'u yig sbri s'ung a'u ngita las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter ā is from the word spṛśā, meaning āṅgirasa.

original: ha na 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: ha na 'tshe ba la'o //
translated: Hāna means to harm.

original: ma na shes pa la'o //
analyzed: ma na shes pa la'o //
translated: Māna means knowledge.

original: na yig las aa yig klog don no //
analyzed: na yig las aa yig klog don no //
translated: The letter na is read as the letter a.

original: ai di mchog gi dbang phyug la'o //
analyzed: ai di mchog gi dbang phyug la'o //
translated: Īḍa means supreme lord.

original: ai yig ai dita las nu ma'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: ai yig ai dita las nu ma'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter ī is from the word īḍita, meaning breast.

original: ai dita las nu ma zhes pas nu ma'o //
analyzed: ai dita las nu ma zhes pas nu ma'o //
translated: From īḍita, it means breast.

original: au yig brjod don no //
analyzed: au yig brjod don no //
translated: The letter u is for the purpose of expression.

original: ma yig mi ta aa tsa'i mtha' las pha rol lo zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: ma yig mi ta aa tsa'i mtha' las pha rol lo zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The sign of the final letter of the class of the semivowel ya is “the other side.”

original: ka di kra di kla di bod pa la'o //🔽ai yig sngar bzhin dbyi'o //
analyzed: ka di kra di kla di bod pa la'o // ai yig sngar bzhin dbyi'o //
translated: The sign of the final letter of the class of the sibilants is “the Tibetan.”🔽The vowel i is as before.

original: nu ma banda 'ching ba la'o //
analyzed: nu ma banda 'ching ba la'o //
translated: The sign of the final letter of the class of the gutturals is “the breast.”

original: aa yig brjod don no //
analyzed: aa yig brjod don no //
translated: The sign of the final letter of the class of the cerebrals is “the word.”

original: 'di rnams las au pha rol du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams las au pha rol du 'gyur ro //
translated: Of these, the sign of the final letter of the class of the dentals is “the other side.”

original: sa'i ru nyid do //
analyzed: sa'i ru nyid do //
translated: The sign of the final letter of the class of the labials is “the earth.”

original: rnam par bcad pa'o /
analyzed: rnam par bcad pa'o /
translated: The sign of the final letter of the class of the palatals is “the negation.”🔽The sign of the final letter of the class of the sibilants is “the wise.”🔽The sign of the final letter of the class of the gutturals is “the clear expression.”🔽The sign of the final letter of the class of the cerebrals is “the wealth.”🔽The sign of the final letter of the class of the dentals is “the substance.”

original: (/ mkhas pa/)...pa tu: (gsal bar brjod pa'o/).../ sphu ta b'a d'i aa su p'a ni (nor/)...ba su: (rdzas so/).../ pra byam tra su: sh'i sam ...('gram pa/) dha nu: ('khur ba'i phyogs gcig go/).../ ba da nee ka de sha: ma nu pra dz'a ya ti: ...(skye dgu'i bdag po/)
analyzed: (/ mkhas pa/)...pa tu: (gsal bar brjod pa'o/).../ sphu ta b'a d'i aa su p'a ni (nor/)...ba su: (rdzas so/).../ pra byam tra su: sh'i sam ...('gram pa/) dha nu: ('khur ba'i phyogs gcig go/).../ ba da nee ka de sha: ma nu pra dz'a ya ti: ...(skye dgu'i bdag po/)
translated: The sign of the final letter of the class of the labials is “the cheek.”🔽The sign of the final letter of the class of the palatals is “the side of the shoulder.”🔽The sign of the final letter of the class of the sibilants is “the lord of beings.”

original: / aim du: tsandra ma:...(ri bong can /
analyzed: / aim du: tsandra ma:...(ri bong can /
translated: The sign of the final letter of the class of the gutturals is “the moon.”

original: 'khur ba byed pa'i thab mthon bo/)...ka nu: p'a ka sth'a nam ...('tshed pa'i gnas/) bandya shtsa ...(gnyen/) sva dza na: ...(rang gi skye bo/) ba hi pi sa'i ring po 'ang ngo //
analyzed: 'khur ba byed pa'i thab mthon bo/)...ka nu: p'a ka sth'a nam ...('tshed pa'i gnas/) bandya shtsa ...(gnyen/) sva dza na: ...(rang gi skye bo/) ba hi pi sa'i ring po 'ang ngo //
translated: bahuḥ.

original: ba ha thob par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: ba ha thob par byed pa la'o //
translated: ha is used for the attainment of something.

original: ha yig las aa yig klog pa'i don to //
analyzed: ha yig las aa yig klog pa'i don to //
translated: ha is used for the reading of the letter a.

original: pa si nyams pa la'o //
analyzed: pa si nyams pa la'o //
translated: pa is used for the loss of something.

original: ai @73b yig ai dita kyi nu ma'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: ai @73b yig ai dita kyi nu ma'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter i is the sign of the word idā.

original: 'di nyid kyis nu ma'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis nu ma'o //
translated: This is the same as the word for breast.

original: au yig dang / ma yig gi sngar bzhin dbyi'o //
analyzed: au yig dang / ma yig gi sngar bzhin dbyi'o //
translated: The letter u and the letter m are the same as before.

original: 'di dag las au pha rol du 'gyur ro //🔽ring po 'ang ngo zhes pas ba yig ba yig dag gi aa yig gi aa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di dag las au pha rol du 'gyur ro // ring po 'ang ngo zhes pas ba yig ba yig dag gi aa yig gi aa nyid do //
translated: From these, u becomes para.🔽The letter va is the same as the letter ba.🔽The letter hu is the word for hand.

original: ba hu: (lag pa'o/).../ bhu dz'a: dzha la la mtha' ma yin pa'i ni 'ang ngo zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
analyzed: ba hu: (lag pa'o/).../ bhu dz'a: dzha la la mtha' ma yin pa'i ni 'ang ngo zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
translated: The letter jha is used at the end of a word.🔽The letter pa is the word for dust.

original: p'am pu: (rdul/)...re nu: na mi ma ni dza na rnams kyi n'a ki /
analyzed: p'am pu: (rdul/)...re nu: na mi ma ni dza na rnams kyi n'a ki /
translated: The letter na is the word for the nose.

original: dha ta yang ngo //
analyzed: dha ta yang ngo //
translated: The letter dha is the word for the navel.

original: na ma rab tu 'dus pa dang sgra la'o //
analyzed: na ma rab tu 'dus pa dang sgra la'o //
translated: Nama is for a great assembly and sound.

original: na'i na'o zhes pas na yig go //
analyzed: na'i na'o zhes pas na yig go //
translated: Na is for na.

original: ma na shes pa la'o //
analyzed: ma na shes pa la'o //
translated: Ma is for knowledge.

original: ma yig na yig dag gi aa yig brjod don no //
analyzed: ma yig na yig dag gi aa yig brjod don no //
translated: The a of the ma and na is for the meaning of expression.

original: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
translated: Ja is for the arising of the supreme.

original: a'i yig shvi a'i dita las ta ta bata dag la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: a'i yig shvi a'i dita las ta ta bata dag la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The a is for śvā and ā, and the ta and ta are for the meaning of the sign.

original: 'di rnams las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Of these, u is for the other side.

original: n'a ki dha ta yang ngo zhes pas na mi'i n'a ki'o //🔽ma ni'i na yig gi dha yig go //
analyzed: n'a ki dha ta yang ngo zhes pas na mi'i n'a ki'o // ma ni'i na yig gi dha yig go //
translated: Na is for kī and dha.🔽Ma is for ni and the dha of the na.

original: dza ni'i yang na yig gi ta yig go //
analyzed: dza ni'i yang na yig gi ta yig go //
translated: Ja is for ni and the ta of the na.

original: ai yig brjod pa'i don to //
analyzed: ai yig brjod pa'i don to //
translated: The i is for the meaning of expression.

original: dha yig dang ta yig dag gi yang aa yig klog pa'i don nyid do //🔽n'a ku: (grog mkhar ro/).../ b'almi ka: su aam dag gi ma ning las so zhes pas su dbyi'o /
analyzed: dha yig dang ta yig dag gi yang aa yig klog pa'i don nyid do // n'a ku: (grog mkhar ro/).../ b'almi ka: su aam dag gi ma ning las so zhes pas su dbyi'o /
translated: The a of the dha and ta is for the meaning of reading.🔽Na is for ku and the va of lā.🔽Su is for the neuter of am.

original: (/ sbrang/)...ma dhu (me tog gi dor/).../ kshoo  dram dza tu l'aksh'a ...(rgya skyegs/) pa li pha mi'i gug kyang ngo //
analyzed: (/ sbrang/)...ma dhu (me tog gi dor/).../ kshoo  dram dza tu l'aksh'a ...(rgya skyegs/) pa li pha mi'i gug kyang ngo //
translated: Ma is for madhu and kṣaudra.

original: ba la stobs la'o //
analyzed: ba la stobs la'o //
translated: ba to bala.

original: pha la rdzogs pa la'o //
analyzed: pha la rdzogs pa la'o //
translated: pha to pūrṇa.🔽 la to ā.

original: la yig gi aa yig brjod don no //🔽'di dag las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //🔽gug kyang ngo zhes pas gug a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: la yig gi aa yig brjod don no // 'di dag las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro // gug kyang ngo zhes pas gug a'a ga ma'o //

original: au yig brjod pa'i don to //🔽ka yig ta kita dag dang po tha ma dag go zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //
analyzed: au yig brjod pa'i don to // ka yig ta kita dag dang po tha ma dag go zhes pa'i rtags kyi don to //

analyzed: balgu: (yid du 'ong ba'o/).../ ma no dznya: phalgu: aa p'a ra:...(snying po med pa'o/) ni las aanytsa las so //

analyzed: aanytsu 'gro ba la'o // au yig au dita las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: an to gati.🔽 u to uditam.

original: ni snga ma'i aanytsa las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ni snga ma'i aanytsa las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: ni to anuca.🔽 i to acyutam.🔽 a to acyutam.

analyzed: ai ka'i aatsa la ya na'o zhes pas ni yig las ai yig gi ya nar bsgyur ro // dbyangs med pa dbyangs dang sbyar ro //
translated: a to acyutam.

original: n+yam ku la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas /
analyzed: n+yam ku la sogs pa rnams so zhes pas /
translated: nyam to kula.🔽 ca to ga.

original: tsa yig gi ga yig go //
analyzed: tsa yig gi ga yig go //
translated: ca to ga.

original: @74a * // dzhal la mtha' ma yin pa'i na'i 'ang ngo zhes pas na yig gi rjes su nga ro'o //
analyzed: @74a * // dzhal la mtha' ma yin pa'i na'i 'ang ngo zhes pas na yig gi rjes su nga ro'o //

analyzed: rjes su nga ro'i yay\ la yam\ 'o zhes pas chos nye ba'i nga yig go //
translated: The a is the proximate of ya, and ya is the proximate of la.

analyzed: 'di rnams @77a * //
translated: Ai is for to be.🔽 Keta is for banner,🔽 Dhvaja is for to be.🔽 Pit is for sun,

original: las tu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las tu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Sūrya is for to go,🔽 Ungat is for to be,🔽 Yāta is for to desire.🔽 Ka is for to know.🔽 Ai is for to be.

original: aarti'i aat aeng med pa tshig phrad do //
analyzed: aarti'i aat aeng med pa tshig phrad do //
translated: E is for to be.🔽 Ka is for to be.🔽 Mu is for to be.🔽 Ka is for to be.

original: sngar bzhin su'i ru nyid do //
analyzed: sngar bzhin su'i ru nyid do //
translated: Ai is for to be.

original: rnam par bcad pa'o /
analyzed: rnam par bcad pa'o /
translated: E is for to be.🔽 Ka is for to be.🔽 Mu is for to be.🔽 Ka is for to be.🔽 Ai is for to be.

original: (dus/)...ri tu: (dgun sa la sogs 'dod/)...he manp'a dri: ka ro ti'i ri yig gi re pha ru bsgyur ro //
analyzed: (dus/)...ri tu: (dgun sa la sogs 'dod/)...he manp'a dri: ka ro ti'i ri yig gi re pha ru bsgyur ro //
translated: E is for to be.🔽 Ka is for to be.🔽 Mu is for to be.🔽 Ka is for to be.

original: kra tu:sa so ma ko yadznya:...(mchod sbyin no/) / ae nyid aeng ngo /
analyzed: kra tu:sa so ma ko yadznya:...(mchod sbyin no/) / ae nyid aeng ngo /
translated: Ai is for to be.🔽 E is for to be.

original: (/ tog).../ kee tu: (rgyal mtshan/)...dhva dza: pi ba ti'i a'i nyid do //
analyzed: (/ tog).../ kee tu: (rgyal mtshan/)...dhva dza: pi ba ti'i a'i nyid do //
translated: Ka is for to be.🔽 Mu is for to be.🔽 Ka is for to be.🔽 Ai is for to be.🔽 E is for to be.

original: p'i tu: (nyi ma'o/).../ s'urya: g'a tu: aungga ta: bh'a tu: y'a tu: k'a mu ka ae dhi /
analyzed: p'i tu: (nyi ma'o/).../ s'urya: g'a tu: aungga ta: bh'a tu: y'a tu: k'a mu ka ae dhi /
translated: Ka is for to be.🔽 Mu is for to be.🔽 Ka is for to be.🔽 Ai is for to be.🔽 E is for to be

original: ba ha dag las aa ka tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: ba ha dag las aa ka tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: The two syllables ba and ha are to be combined with the syllable a.

original: ka yig kit bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ka yig kit bya ba'i don to //
translated: The syllable ka means “to do.”

original: ae dha tu: pu ru sha:...(skyes bu'o/) / ba ha ru: (glang ngo/).../ aa na t'a ni dz'i bi las aa ka tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: ae dha tu: pu ru sha:...(skyes bu'o/) / ba ha ru: (glang ngo/).../ aa na t'a ni dz'i bi las aa ka tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: The syllable e is combined with the syllable a from the syllable dhatuḥ, “person,” and the syllable va from the syllable bahuḥ, “ox.”

original: snga ma bzhin ka yig dbyi'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin ka yig dbyi'o //
translated: The syllable ka is as before.

original: dz'i ba tu: (sman no/).../ aoo sha dha: a'apno ti'i thung ngu nyid do //
analyzed: dz'i ba tu: (sman no/).../ aoo sha dha: a'apno ti'i thung ngu nyid do //
translated: The syllable jīva is combined with the syllable a from the syllable anantāni, “medicines.”🔽The syllable ka is as before.

original: aaptu: (mchod pa can no/)...y'a dznya ka: 'di lta bu gzhan yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: aaptu: (mchod pa can no/)...y'a dznya ka: 'di lta bu gzhan yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: The syllable o is combined with the syllable a from the syllable apnoti, “to worship.”🔽The syllable tuḥ is combined with the syllable ya from the syllable yajñaḥ.

original: sta ni hri shi pu shi ga di ma di rnams las ni las aitnu tsi'o //
analyzed: sta ni hri shi pu shi ga di ma di rnams las ni las aitnu tsi'o //
translated: The syllable sta is combined with the syllable i from the syllable hrīśi, the syllable puśi, the syllable gati, and the syllable mati.

original: sta na bha na ka la sgra'i don rnams so //
analyzed: sta na bha na ka la sgra'i don rnams so //
translated: The syllable sta means “to give.”

original: hri shu kun tu sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: hri shu kun tu sbyor ba la'o //
translated: The syllable hrīśu means “to unite.”

original: pu sha rgyas pa la'o //
analyzed: pu sha rgyas pa la'o //
translated: The syllable puśa means “to increase.”

original: ga da brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: ga da brjod pa la'o //
translated: The syllable gati means “to speak.”

original: ma d'i dga' ba la'o //
analyzed: ma d'i dga' ba la'o //
translated: The syllable mati means “to delight.”

original: aa yig sogs dbyi ba gong bzhin no ;
analyzed: aa yig sogs dbyi ba gong bzhin no ;
translated: The syllable a and so forth are elided as before.

original: / sgra la rab tu sbyor zhes sogs dag byas nas sbyor ba po'i bya ba la'o zhes pas nitsa'o //
analyzed: / sgra la rab tu sbyor zhes sogs dag byas nas sbyor ba po'i bya ba la'o zhes pas nitsa'o //
translated: Having purified pra-mu-dh-i-ra-bha-va-na-ya, the affix is to the action of the agent.

original: na yig nynata la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: na yig nynata la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter na is in nya-nta-la. The sign is the meaning.

original: tsa yig dbyangs kyi don no //
analyzed: tsa yig dbyangs kyi don no //
translated: The letter ca is the meaning of the vowel.

original: nynita la'o zhes pa mang po brjod pa las a'a nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nynita la'o zhes pa mang po brjod pa las a'a nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In nya-ni-ta-la, from the expression of many, the very a does not occur.

original: 'di rnams ni mtha' rnams las aitnu tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni mtha' rnams las aitnu tsa pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: These are the endings: ita-nu-ca-para-tu.

original: tsa yig tsi ne zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: tsa yig tsi ne zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter ca is in ci-ne. The sign is the meaning.

original: 'di yis aa ya ni a'a lv'a ye ta nu sha zhes pas ni'i aay\ ru bsgyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yis aa ya ni a'a lv'a ye ta nu sha zhes pas ni'i aay\ ru bsgyur ro //
translated: By this, a-ya-ni-a-la-bha-ya-ita-nu-sha is changed to ni-a-yu.

original: sta na yitnu: me gha:...(sprin no/) / yang ba mtha' nye'i 'o zhes pas ae nyid do //
analyzed: sta na yitnu: me gha:...(sprin no/) / yang ba mtha' nye'i 'o zhes pas ae nyid do //
translated: In sta-na-yi-ta-nu-ma-gha-a-pa-ra-ta, the very e is by ya-pa-anta-nya-upasarga.

original: ra pha rol lo //
analyzed: ra pha rol lo //
translated: The r is the other.

original: harsha yitnu: su barna:...(gser/) yang ba mtha' nye'i 'o zhes pas ao nyid do //
analyzed: harsha yitnu: su barna:...(gser/) yang ba mtha' nye'i 'o zhes pas ao nyid do //
translated: In ha-r-sha-yi-ta-nu-su-var-na-a-pa-ra-ta, the very o is by ya-pa-anta-nya-upasarga.🔽 🔽a-pa-ra-ta is the other.

original: bo sha yi tnu: (khu byug go).../ koo ki la: ba da yitnum: b'a ba du ka:...(cal col smra ba'o/) / ma da yi tnum: (tsab mo'o/).../ pva r'a: hri kri dag las aa nu'o //
analyzed: bo sha yi tnu: (khu byug go).../ koo ki la: ba da yitnum: b'a ba du ka:...(cal col smra ba'o/) / ma da yi tnum: (tsab mo'o/).../ pva r'a: hri kri dag las aa nu'o //
translated: ma-da-yita-nu,  (the bee).🔽 pa-vra-hri-kri-da,  (the thief).

original: hrinya 'phrog pa la'o //🔽nya yig hri nya las 'phrog @77b pa'i ngang tshul la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: hrinya 'phrog pa la'o // nya yig hri nya las 'phrog @77b pa'i ngang tshul la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: hri-kri-da,  (the thief).🔽 nya-hri-kri-da,  (the thief).

original: du krinya byed pa la'o //🔽du yig du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: du krinya byed pa la'o // du yig du 'gro ba las ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: du-kri-nya,  (the thief).🔽 du-kri-nya,  (the thief).

original: nya yig krinya las pu ta med pa las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: nya yig krinya las pu ta med pa las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: nya-kri-nya,  (the thief).

original: 'di dag las ae nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag las ae nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: e-nu,  (the other side).

original: ai ka'i aat\ aeng ngo zhes pas aa nyid do //
analyzed: ai ka'i aat\ aeng ngo zhes pas aa nyid do //
translated: i-ka-a-ta,  (the self).

original: ra pha rol lo //🔽ha re nu: ganda dra byam ...(dri bzang po'i rdzas/) ka re nu:/
analyzed: ra pha rol lo // ha re nu: ganda dra byam ...(dri bzang po'i rdzas/) ka re nu:/
translated: ra-nu,  (the other side).🔽 ha-re-nu,  (the fragrant substance).

original: d'a bh'a dag las nu'o //
analyzed: d'a bh'a dag las nu'o //
translated: da-bha-nu,  (the thief).🔽 du-da-nya,  (the giver).

original: du d'anya\ sbyin pa la'o //🔽du yig du 'gro ba las /🔽ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: du d'anya\ sbyin pa la'o // du yig du 'gro ba las / ktri'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: du-da-nya,  (the giver).

original: bh'a 'bar ba la'o //
analyzed: bh'a 'bar ba la'o //
translated: bha-nu,  (the thief).🔽 bha-nu,  (the thief).

original: 'di dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these, the final nu becomes the other.

original: d'a nu: d'a t'a: bh'argu: bh'a ska ra: r'i bhrinya dag las ni ta'o //
analyzed: d'a nu: d'a t'a: bh'argu: bh'a ska ra: r'i bhrinya dag las ni ta'o //
translated: From dānu, dāta, bhargu, bhāskara, and rībhṛ, the final a becomes ta.

original: ri bri 'gro ba la'o //🔽brinya sgrib pa la'o //
analyzed: ri bri 'gro ba la'o // brinya sgrib pa la'o //
translated: Ri is for going.🔽Bṛ is for covering.

original: nya yig brinya las sgrib pa la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: nya yig brinya las sgrib pa la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The syllable nya is for covering, from the syllable bṛ.

original: 'di dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these, the final nu becomes the other.

original: nit\ zhes pas na yig phyis pa bzhin no //
analyzed: nit\ zhes pas na yig phyis pa bzhin no //
translated: From nit, the syllable na is elided.

original: de yis nit  dbyangs don no //
analyzed: de yis nit  dbyangs don no //
translated: By that, nit has the meaning of the vowel.

original: ai ka'i aat aeng ngo zhes pas aeng dang aa nyid dang ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: ai ka'i aat aeng ngo zhes pas aeng dang aa nyid dang ra pha rol nyid do //
translated: From ika, at, and aṅ, aṅ, a itself, and ra, the other.

original: tshig gcig las ra sha las na'i na'o zhes pas na nyid do //
analyzed: tshig gcig las ra sha las na'i na'o zhes pas na nyid do //
translated: From one word, ra, śa, and la, ni, na.

original: re nu dhu li: barnnu: na da: s'u: bi shi dag las ki tra'o //
analyzed: re nu dhu li: barnnu: na da: s'u: bi shi dag las ki tra'o //
translated: From re, nu, dhūli, varṇa, na, and sau, viśi, the final a becomes kṛt.

original: sh'u ded pa la'o //
analyzed: sh'u ded pa la'o //
translated: Śā is for going.

original: shthi bu dang shva ka min pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig go //
analyzed: shthi bu dang shva ka min pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig go //
translated: From sth, bu, and śva, the first śa is sa.

original: bi shli khyab pa la'o //
analyzed: bi shli khyab pa la'o //
translated: Viśi is for pervading.

original: li yig li 'gro ba dang rgyu tang la sogs pa dang pu shya ti la sogs pa rnams las aa tang la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no//
analyzed: li yig li 'gro ba dang rgyu tang la sogs pa dang pu shya ti la sogs pa rnams las aa tang la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no//
translated: The letters li, li, gacchati, gacchati, etc., and puṣya, puṣya, etc., are changed to aṅga, aṅga, etc., and puṣya, puṣya, etc., respectively.

original: 'di dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag las nu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these, the suffix nu is added.

original: kit bzhin no //
analyzed: kit bzhin no //
translated: Like kit.

original: de yis kit\ la'o zhes pa'i so so'i sgrub pa ki ta bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yis kit\ la'o zhes pa'i so so'i sgrub pa ki ta bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, kit is changed to kit.🔽vau, putra,🔽viṣṇu, narāyaṇa,

original: b'u nu: pu tra:...(bu'o/) / bishnu: na r'a ya na:...(khyab 'jug go/) / dhe nu la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: b'u nu: pu tra:...(bu'o/) / bishnu: na r'a ya na:...(khyab 'jug go/) / dhe nu la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: dhenu, etc.

original: dhenu: dza hnu: sth'a nu: bi nu: bagnu: sgra 'di rnams nu pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: dhenu: dza hnu: sth'a nu: bi nu: bagnu: sgra 'di rnams nu pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: The words dhenu, jahnu, sthānu, vinu, bhanu, these are the suffixes nu, etc.

original: dha ta btung ba la'o //
analyzed: dha ta btung ba la'o //
translated: Dhat means to drink.

original: tshig phrad las shi ta ma yin pa la aetsa'i a'a ta'o zhes pa'i a'a nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshig phrad las shi ta ma yin pa la aetsa'i a'a ta'o zhes pa'i a'a nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: From the sandhi, it is not śita, but the ā of eca becomes ā itself.

original: ae ha ka gtong ba la'o //
analyzed: ae ha ka gtong ba la'o //
translated: Eha means to give.

original: ao yig ao di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: ao yig ao di ta las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter o is from oṃ iti.

original: ka yig h'a ka'i @78a * //
analyzed: ka yig h'a ka'i @78a * //
translated: The letter ka is from haṃkāra.

original: tv'a la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: tv'a la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter tva is from tvaṃ.

original: shth'a 'gro ba ldog pa la'o //
analyzed: shth'a 'gro ba ldog pa la'o //
translated: Ṣa is for the reversal of going.

original: shthi bu dang shvak min pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sa nyid do //
analyzed: shthi bu dang shvak min pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sa nyid do //
translated: Ṣa is for the earth of the first Ṣa that is not a son or a śva.

original: rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can gyi'ang med do zhes pas tha yig gi tha yig go //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can gyi'ang med do zhes pas tha yig gi tha yig go //
translated: The letter Tha is for the letter Tha, because if there is no reason, there is no one with a reason.

original: b'i 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: b'i 'gro ba la'o //
translated: Ba is for going.

original: ba da brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: ba da brjod pa la'o //
translated: Ba is for expression.

original: da yig las aa yig brjod don no //
analyzed: da yig las aa yig brjod don no //
translated: The letter A is for the letter A, which is expressed from the letter Da.

original: 'di rnams las nu 'gyur ro /
analyzed: 'di rnams las nu 'gyur ro /
translated: From these, there is Nu.🔽Dhe Nu is for a young bull.

original: (/ bzhon ma/)...dhe nu: (be'u gzhon nu 'brang ba'i 'o  /)...na ba pra s'u tra goo: tshig phrad las /
analyzed: (/ bzhon ma/)...dhe nu: (be'u gzhon nu 'brang ba'i 'o  /)...na ba pra s'u tra goo: tshig phrad las /
translated: Na is for a young calf that follows.

original: dza h'a ti'i gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: dza h'a ti'i gnyis brjod do //
translated: The two are expressed from Jaha.

original: thung ngu'o zhes pas thung ngu nyid do //
analyzed: thung ngu'o zhes pas thung ngu nyid do //
translated: The short one is for shortness.

original: ku ha dag gi tsu'o zhes pas ha yig gi dza yig go //
analyzed: ku ha dag gi tsu'o zhes pas ha yig gi dza yig go //
translated: The letter Ja is for the letter Ha, because of the words “from the pure ones.”

original: tshig phrad las aa yig dbyi ba nyid do //
analyzed: tshig phrad las aa yig dbyi ba nyid do //
translated: The letter A is for the letter A, which is elided from the compound.

original: dza hnu: ri shi:...(drang srong/) tshig phrad las nu nyid do //
analyzed: dza hnu: ri shi:...(drang srong/) tshig phrad las nu nyid do //
translated: Nu is for the sage, because of the compound.

original: sth'a nu: ma h'a de ba:...(lha chen po/) ai ka'i aat aeng ngo zhes pas ae nyid do //
analyzed: sth'a nu: ma h'a de ba:...(lha chen po/) ai ka'i aat aeng ngo zhes pas ae nyid do //
translated: Mahadeva is for the great god, because of the words “the letter Ai and the letter A.”

original: be nu: bam sha ...(smyig ma'o/) ba di'i nga yig gi ga yig go //
analyzed: be nu: bam sha ...(smyig ma'o/) ba di'i nga yig gi ga yig go //
translated: The u of bhe is the ga of ga.

original: bagnu: b'a ba d'u ka: kshi phi na di dag las tsa nu nga'o //
analyzed: bagnu: b'a ba d'u ka: kshi phi na di dag las tsa nu nga'o //
translated: The u of bhe and the va of va are the ca of ca.

original: kshi pa ded pa la'o //
analyzed: kshi pa ded pa la'o //
translated: The kṣa of kṣa is the pa of pa.

original: ba yig las aa yig brjod don no //
analyzed: ba yig las aa yig brjod don no //
translated: The va is the a of a.

original: na da mi gsal ba'i sgra la'o //
analyzed: na da mi gsal ba'i sgra la'o //
translated: The na is the indistinct sound.

original: da yig las aa yig brjod don no //
analyzed: da yig las aa yig brjod don no //
translated: The da is the a of a.

original: na'i na'o zhes pas na yig gi na yig go //
analyzed: na'i na'o zhes pas na yig gi na yig go //
translated: The na of na is the na of na.

original: 'di dag las tsa nu da pha rol tu 'gyur ro //🔽tsa yig las aa yig phyung nas tsa yig dbyangs kyi don no //
analyzed: 'di dag las tsa nu da pha rol tu 'gyur ro // tsa yig las aa yig phyung nas tsa yig dbyangs kyi don no //
translated: From these, ca becomes ca.🔽The ca is the a of a.

original: nga yig kit la'o zhes pa'i aat aeng 'gegs pa'i don no //
analyzed: nga yig kit la'o zhes pa'i aat aeng 'gegs pa'i don no //
translated: The ṅa is the a of a.

original: de yis yang ba mtha' nya'i zhes pas ae nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yis yang ba mtha' nya'i zhes pas ae nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The a is not changed to e.🔽The kṣa of kṣa is the va of va.

original: kshi ba nu: (rlung/)...ba yu: na da nu: (sprin/)...me gha: sarti las aa yu'o //
analyzed: kshi ba nu: (rlung/)...ba yu: na da nu: (sprin/)...me gha: sarti las aa yu'o //
translated: The na of na is the gha of gha.

original: sri 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: sri 'gro ba la'o //
translated: The sa is the a of a.

original: 'di las aa yu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las aa yu pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From this, a becomes a.

original: ai ka'i ait aeng ngo zhes pas aa nyid do //
analyzed: ai ka'i ait aeng ngo zhes pas aa nyid do //
translated: The i is the i of i.

original: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra pha rol nyid do //
translated: From ri, ki, and aṇ, ra. Ra means the other side.

original: sa ra yu: (chu klung/)...na d'i dza ni ma ni da si bh'u dzi las kyus so //
analyzed: sa ra yu: (chu klung/)...na d'i dza ni ma ni da si bh'u dzi las kyus so //
translated: From sa, ra, yu, and ḥ, ku. Sa ra yuḥ means the river. Na di ja ni ma ni da si bhu ji la kuḥ means with a ladle.

original: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
translated: Ja ni means to be born.

original: ai yig shvi ai dit las ta ta bad dag la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: ai yig shvi ai dit las ta ta bad dag la'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: From i, śva, and i, ta. Ta tat means those two.

original: ma na shes pa la'o //
analyzed: ma na shes pa la'o //
translated: Ma na means to know.

original: na yig las aa yig brjod don no //
analyzed: na yig las aa yig brjod don no //
translated: From na, a is pronounced.

original: da su nye bar 'phan pa la'o //
analyzed: da su nye bar 'phan pa la'o //
translated: Da su means to be near.

original: @78b au yig au dit las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: @78b au yig au dit las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //

original: bhu dza skyong ba la'o //
analyzed: bhu dza skyong ba la'o //

original: dza yig las aa yig klog pa'i don no //
analyzed: dza yig las aa yig klog pa'i don no //

analyzed: 'di rnams las kyus pha rol tu 'gyur ro // ka yig aat aeng sa 'gegs pa'i don no //

original: dza n+yu: pr'a n'i ma n+yu: kro dha: da byu: tsoo ra:...(chom rkun/) bhu dzyu: (zas/)...ao da na: hr'i ai shi kri shi rnams las kuk suk a'a nuka'o //
analyzed: dza n+yu: pr'a n'i ma n+yu: kro dha: da byu: tsoo ra:...(chom rkun/) bhu dzyu: (zas/)...ao da na: hr'i ai shi kri shi rnams las kuk suk a'a nuka'o //
translated: Janyuh, pranih, manyuh, krodhah, dahyuh, cah, bhujyuh, odanah, hri, ishi, kshiri. From these, kuk, suk, anuk.

original: hr'i ngo tsha ba la'o //
analyzed: hr'i ngo tsha ba la'o //
translated: Hri is for shame.

original: ai shu 'dod pa la 'o //
analyzed: ai shu 'dod pa la 'o //

original: au yig au dit las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: au yig au dit las yang na'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter u is for again, as in uditah.

original: krisha lus byed pa la'o //
analyzed: krisha lus byed pa la'o //

original: sha yig las aa yig brjod don no //
analyzed: sha yig las aa yig brjod don no //

original: 'di rnams las rim pa ji lta bar kug suk a'a nuk 'di rnams pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams las rim pa ji lta bar kug suk a'a nuk 'di rnams pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these, in order, kuk, suk, anuk are the superlatives.🔽 The letter a is for to do, as in akritam.

analyzed: aa yig kit la'o zhes pas aat aeng 'gegs pa'i don no //

analyzed: hl'i ku: sa la sha dha dag gi ke'o zhes pas sha yig gi ka yig go //

original: ku las kyang zhes pas sha nyid do //
analyzed: ku las kyang zhes pas sha nyid do //
translated: Sha is for ku, as in shaku.🔽 Sha is for

original: aikshu: kh'arya bi she sha: kri sh'a nu: ba hni: mring las tyu ka'o //
analyzed: aikshu: kh'arya bi she sha: kri sh'a nu: ba hni: mring las tyu ka'o //
translated: ikshu, ksharya-vishesha, kshashanu, vahni, mrnga-tyuk.

original: mring srog gtong ba la'o //
analyzed: mring srog gtong ba la'o //
translated: mrnga is for giving up life.

original: nga yig ngita 'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: nga yig ngita 'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //

original: 'di las tyuk pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las tyuk pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

original: ka yig kit la'o zhes pas aat aeng 'gegs pa'i don no /
analyzed: ka yig kit la'o zhes pas aat aeng 'gegs pa'i don no /
translated: The letter ka is for kit. Thus, at is the meaning of blocking.🔽{death or not dead}🔽mi-tyuḥ, praṇa-viyogaḥ, {deprived of life}

original: (/'chi ba'am ma shi ba/)...mi tyu: pr'a na bi yo ga:...(srog dang bral ba/) sh'ing las dhuka'o //
analyzed: (/'chi ba'am ma shi ba/)...mi tyu: pr'a na bi yo ga:...(srog dang bral ba/) sh'ing las dhuka'o //

original: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //

analyzed: nga yig lit ma yin pa la sh'ing gi aeta'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //

original: 'di las dhu ka pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las dhu ka pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

original: ka yig kit la'o zhes pas aat aang 'gegs pa'i don to //
analyzed: ka yig kit la'o zhes pas aat aang 'gegs pa'i don to //
translated: The letter ka is for kit. Thus, at is the meaning of blocking.

original: sh'i dhu: su r'a bi she sha: pr'i las shu na aa shu tsa dag go //
analyzed: sh'i dhu: su r'a bi she sha: pr'i las shu na aa shu tsa dag go //
translated: shī-dhuḥ, sura-visheshaḥ, prīti-śucana-aśucāḥ.

original: pr'i skyong ba la'o //
analyzed: pr'i skyong ba la'o //
translated: prīti is for protecting.

original: 'di las shun la aa shu tsa dag 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las shun la aa shu tsa dag 'gyur ro //

original: na yig dang tsa yig dbyangs kyi don no //
analyzed: na yig dang tsa yig dbyangs kyi don no //
translated: The letters na and ca are the meaning of vowel.

original: ai ga'i aat aeng zhes pas aa nyid do //
analyzed: ai ga'i aat aeng zhes pas aa nyid do //

original: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra @79a * //🔽pha rol lo //
analyzed: ri ka'i aan las ra la dag go zhes pas ra @79a * // pha rol lo //

original: re pha las aa yig brjod don no //
analyzed: re pha las aa yig brjod don no //
translated: The pa of para is the o [vowel].

original: barshu: p'arshv'a sthi: dbyangs med dbyangs dang sbyar ro /
analyzed: barshu: p'arshv'a sthi: dbyangs med dbyangs dang sbyar ro /

original: (/ dgra sta/) ...pa ra shu: ku th'a ra: p'i m'i dag las ru'o //
analyzed: (/ dgra sta/) ...pa ra shu: ku th'a ra: p'i m'i dag las ru'o //

original: p'ing btung ba la'o //
analyzed: p'ing btung ba la'o //
translated: The pa of pāṇa is the ā [vowel].

original: m'ing 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: m'ing 'tshe ba la'o //
translated: The ma of māyā is the i [vowel].

original: da yig tat ba ti kyi ha la la sogs pa'i da med pa'i zhes pa'i rtags don no //🔽'di dag las ru pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: da yig tat ba ti kyi ha la la sogs pa'i da med pa'i zhes pa'i rtags don no // 'di dag las ru pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The da of daṇḍa and the ta of tāḍana are the a [vowel].🔽The ru of parā is the o [vowel].

original: ai ka gi aat aeng ngo zhes pas ae nyid do //🔽be ru: bh'a ska ra:...(snang byed do/) me ru: (ri'i rgyal po/) ...sarba ta r'a dz'a su snga ma las su me ru: de nyid do ;
analyzed: ai ka gi aat aeng ngo zhes pas ae nyid do // be ru: bh'a ska ra:...(snang byed do/) me ru: (ri'i rgyal po/) ...sarba ta r'a dz'a su snga ma las su me ru: de nyid do ;
translated: The i of ika and the a of at are the a [vowel].🔽The me of meru and the su of sarvatathāgata are the a [vowel].

original: / dza tru la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: / dza tru la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The ja of jaṭa and so on are the a [vowel].

original: dza tru: sha tru: ru ru: shma shru: kha ru: shi gru: sgra 'di rnams ru pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: dza tru: sha tru: ru ru: shma shru: kha ru: shi gru: sgra 'di rnams ru pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //

original: dza na skyed par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: dza na skyed par byed pa la'o //

original: shatri rnam par 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: shatri rnam par 'tshe ba la'o //

original: ru sgra la'o //
analyzed: ru sgra la'o //

original: shru thos pa la'o //
analyzed: shru thos pa la'o //
translated: Shru means to hear.

original: kha nu nges par 'joms pa la'o //
analyzed: kha nu nges par 'joms pa la'o //
translated: Khana means to destroy.

original: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //

original: 'di rnams las ru pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams las ru pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //

original: de la dza ni dang sha ti'i 'ang ta yig tu bsgyur ba tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: de la dza ni dang sha ti'i 'ang ta yig tu bsgyur ba tshig phrad du bya'o //

analyzed: dza tru: gr'a b'a pra desha: ...(mgrin pa'i cha shas/) sha tru: (dgra'o/)...aa mi tra: tshig phrad las aat aeng med do //

original: ru ru:...(ri dags/) mri ga: shri no ti'i shma sha ru bsgyur ro //
analyzed: ru ru:...(ri dags/) mri ga: shri no ti'i shma sha ru bsgyur ro //

original: shma shru: mu kha ro ma:...(kha spu'o/) / kha na'i ni yig dbyi'o //
analyzed: shma shru: mu kha ro ma:...(kha spu'o/) / kha na'i ni yig dbyi'o //

original: kha ru darba na: she ti'i gak a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: kha ru darba na: she ti'i gak a'a ga ma'o //

original: thung ngu dang aat aeng med pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: thung ngu dang aat aeng med pa'ang ngo //

analyzed: shi gru: (na le sham dkar po'o/).../ so bh'anydza nam 'di lta bu gzhan yang blta bar bya'o // yu las a'a g'u tsa'o //
translated: One should look at other examples of this sort.🔽From yuga, aguca.

original: yu spel pa la'o //
analyzed: yu spel pa la'o //

original: 'di las a'a g'utsa\ pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las a'a g'utsa\ pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

original: tsa yig dbyangs kyi don no //
analyzed: tsa yig dbyangs kyi don no //

original: aika'i aat aeng zhes pas ao nyid do //
analyzed: aika'i aat aeng zhes pas ao nyid do //

analyzed: aetsa'i aay\ aab\ a'ay a'ab rnams so zhes pas aa ba ru bsgyur ro //

analyzed: ya w'a g'u: (thug pa'o/).../ be y'a / bhra mi las du'o //

analyzed: bhra mu dag g-yo ba la'o //

analyzed: mtha'i aatsa sogs kyi 'o zhes pas aa yig dbyi'o //

analyzed: stu'i shtsu dang shtu dag las de dag go zhes pas ta yig gi tsa yig go //

analyzed: ai shtsa a'a shtsa zhes pa dang gi don gyi bsdu ba'o //

original: ra bi la bi aa bi 'a ya ba nga la'o //
analyzed: ra bi la bi aa bi 'a ya ba nga la'o //

analyzed: ai yig ait 'gro ba'i nu ma'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //

analyzed: num\/ nanya sngon du'o //

analyzed: nya yig ni nya'i'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //

analyzed: na yig las aa yig phral ba'i na yig nanya'i na'i'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //

analyzed: ka shashi sha zhes pa danda ka'i byings / ka ba 'gro ba la'o //

analyzed: pa da 'gro ba la'o // sri dza rnam par bcad pa la'o //

analyzed: khardza 'khrud pa la'o //

original: mri dzu dag pa la'o //
analyzed: mri dzu dag pa la'o //

original: nr'i t'i gar la'o //
analyzed: nr'i t'i gar la'o //

original: shri dh'u sgra smad pa la'o //
analyzed: shri dh'u sgra smad pa la'o //

original: kri kha rnam par rko ba la'o //
analyzed: kri kha rnam par rko ba la'o //
translated: kṛ is “digging.”

original: ka mu mdzes pa la'o //
analyzed: ka mu mdzes pa la'o //
translated: ka is “beautiful.”

original: ri ta zhes pa mdo'i byings so //
analyzed: ri ta zhes pa mdo'i byings so //
translated: rita is a root.

original: ae di 'ching ba la'o //
analyzed: ae di 'ching ba la'o //
translated: edi means “binding.”

original: ai dit kyi num sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: ai dit kyi num sngar bzhin no //
translated: idita is the i of itai, “going.”

original: r'a l'a len pa la'o //
analyzed: r'a l'a len pa la'o //

original: ka pa sngon du'o //
analyzed: ka pa sngon du'o //

analyzed: 'di rnams las au pha rol tu 'gyur ro //

original: de la dza mi las bu ka'o //
analyzed: de la dza mi las bu ka'o //

original: au yig brjod don no //
analyzed: au yig brjod don no //
translated: The syllable u is the meaning of the expression.

original: ka yig kit bya ba'i don no //
analyzed: ka yig kit bya ba'i don no //
translated: The syllable ka is the meaning of the word kṛt.🔽Jambū, vṛkṣa, jāti,

original: dzlumba: briksha dz'a ti ...(shing gi khyad par ro/) / dam bhi'i da yig gi aa yig gi ri yi'o //
analyzed: dzlumba: briksha dz'a ti ...(shing gi khyad par ro/) / dam bhi'i da yig gi aa yig gi ri yi'o //

original: rjes su nga ro med pa tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su nga ro med pa tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: The absence of a nasal sound is to be used as a conjunction.

original: drimb'u: sarba dz'a ti: da dhi'i aat kyi ai nyid do //
analyzed: drimb'u: sarba dz'a ti: da dhi'i aat kyi ai nyid do //
translated: Dṛṃbā, sarva, jāti, the syllable di of the syllable adhi is the syllable i itself.

original: ai shu ka a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: ai shu ka a'a ga ma'o //
translated: The syllable i is śuka.

original: au yig brjod don no //
analyzed: au yig brjod don no //
translated: The syllable u is the meaning of the expression.

original: ka yig tkita dag ces  pa dbyi ba sngar bzhin no /
analyzed: ka yig tkita dag ces  pa dbyi ba sngar bzhin no /
translated: The syllable ka is the word kṛt. The syllable e is as before.

original: (/ slar yang byung ba/)...di dhi sh'u randi ka bha ti'i au yig lhan cig aak gi aa ga la ring po'o //
analyzed: (/ slar yang byung ba/)...di dhi sh'u randi ka bha ti'i au yig lhan cig aak gi aa ga la ring po'o //
translated: Again, the syllable di of the syllable dṛṃbha is the syllable u of the syllable śūrandika. The syllable a of the syllable ak is long.

original: bu nar bh'u: bu na ru dhi k'a ka ro ti'i ri yig gi ri ka'i aat aeng zhes pas aa nyid do //
analyzed: bu nar bh'u: bu na ru dhi k'a ka ro ti'i ri yig gi ri ka'i aat aeng zhes pas aa nyid do //
translated: The syllable ri of the syllable bunarbhūḥ is the syllable ri of the syllable bunarudhi. The syllable ka of the syllable adhi is the syllable a itself.

original: ra pha rol lo //
analyzed: ra pha rol lo //
translated: The syllable ra is the other.

original: ka nuk a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: ka nuk a'a ga ma'o //
translated: The syllable ka is the word anāgata.

original: rjes 'brel dbyi ba sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: rjes 'brel dbyi ba sngar bzhin no //
translated: The following syllable e is as before.

original: karkkam n'u: (rgya shug).../ ba da r'i phal aa d'i'i ring po nyid do /
analyzed: karkkam n'u: (rgya shug).../ ba da r'i phal aa d'i'i ring po nyid do /
translated: The syllable ka of the syllable karkāṇu is the long syllable ā of the syllable badara.

original: (/ gru/)...a'a d'u: dza la ta ra n'i ...(chu sgro  gso/) na dbyi ba dang la nyid @80b la ring po nyid do /
analyzed: (/ gru/)...a'a d'u: dza la ta ra n'i ...(chu sgro  gso/) na dbyi ba dang la nyid @80b la ring po nyid do /
translated: “boat” is ā-dū, “to cross” is jala-taraṇī, “to repair a boat” is nava-la, and “long” is la-dīrgha.

original: (/ ku ba/)...aa l'a b'u t'um b'i pha lam ...(tumb'i'i 'bras bu/) ka sha ae rak ka yig kit bya ba'i don no //
analyzed: (/ ku ba/)...aa l'a b'u t'um b'i pha lam ...(tumb'i'i 'bras bu/) ka sha ae rak ka yig kit bya ba'i don no //

original: ra'i aa yig brjod don no /
analyzed: ra'i aa yig brjod don no /
translated: The meaning of the letter a is the meaning of the letter ra.🔽

original: (/ gro ma/)...ka she r'u bha ksha dra byam ...(zas bzang po/) ka si dang pa di'i 'ang ring po nyid do //
analyzed: (/ gro ma/)...ka she r'u bha ksha dra byam ...(zas bzang po/) ka si dang pa di'i 'ang ring po nyid do //

original: k'a s'u: bi ka la b'ak b'a d'u: b'a da dh'a r'i sri dza la yang ba mtha' nye'i zhes pas aa nyid do //
analyzed: k'a s'u: bi ka la b'ak b'a d'u: b'a da dh'a r'i sri dza la yang ba mtha' nye'i zhes pas aa nyid do //
translated: Ka, sa, vi, ka, la, va, ka, va, da, dha, ri, sri, ja, la, ya, nga, ba, mtha', nyi'i zhes pas a nyid do.🔽

original: ra pha rol lo //
analyzed: ra pha rol lo //
translated: The other is the other shore.

original: sardzu bi dyu t'a khardzu briksha dz'a ti: ...(shing gi khyad par/) mri dzi'i snga ma bzhin aa dang ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: sardzu bi dyu t'a khardzu briksha dz'a ti: ...(shing gi khyad par/) mri dzi'i snga ma bzhin aa dang ra pha rol nyid do //

analyzed: mardzu: shud dha bh'anda nri ti dang shri dha'i aat aeng med pa tshig phrad do //

original: nri t'u d'ir gha kri mi: shri dh'u:...(shing lham/) yadzny'a: kri shi'i yang ba mtha' nye'i zhes pas aat aeng ra pha rol lo //
analyzed: nri t'u d'ir gha kri mi: shri dh'u:...(shing lham/) yadzny'a: kri shi'i yang ba mtha' nye'i zhes pas aat aeng ra pha rol lo //

analyzed: karshu: go ma y'agni: ka mi'i buk a'a ga ma'o //

analyzed: au yig brjod don no // ka yig kit bya ba'i don no /

analyzed: au yig aut ces pa'i don no //

analyzed: 'di las rin 'gyur ro //

analyzed: na yig dbyangs don no //

analyzed: yis a'i yig dbyi'o //

analyzed: su dang aa nang sogs sngar bzhin no //

analyzed: mi n'a (skyes bu'o/).../ b'u ru sha: pi tri la sogs pa rnams so //

original: pi tri m'a tri du hi tri na nam tri bha tri dz'a m'a tri sva sri na stri neshtri tvishtra ksha tri ho tri po tri pra sh'astri: zhes pas 'di rnams trin tri tsa'i mtha' tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: pi tri m'a tri du hi tri na nam tri bha tri dz'a m'a tri sva sri na stri neshtri tvishtra ksha tri ho tri po tri pra sh'astri: zhes pas 'di rnams trin tri tsa'i mtha' tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: pitr, matr, duhitar, nandi, bhatr, jāmatr, sasr, str, niśatr, dviśatr, kṣatr, hotr, potr, praśastr.

original: p'a srung ba la'o //🔽du ha 'jo ba la'o //
analyzed: p'a srung ba la'o // du ha 'jo ba la'o //
translated: Pa is for the protector.🔽Duha is for the milker.

original: tu na di bsags pa la'o //
analyzed: tu na di bsags pa la'o //
translated: Tu is for the accumulation.

original: tu yig tu 'gro ba las aa thu tsa'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: tu yig tu 'gro ba las aa thu tsa'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter tu is for the going, from the meaning of the affix athuc.

original: ai yig ai dita las nu ma'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: ai yig ai dita las nu ma'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: The letter i is for the nipple, from the meaning of the affix id.

original: numra\ :nanya sngon du'o //
analyzed: numra\ :nanya sngon du'o //
translated: Numeral: nyan is before.

original: nya yig nanya'i 'o zhes sogs rtags don no //
analyzed: nya yig nanya'i 'o zhes sogs rtags don no //
translated: The letter nya is for the nipple, etc., from the meaning of the affix.

original: tshig phrad las nanya'i na'o zhes pas na dbyi ba med do //
analyzed: tshig phrad las nanya'i na'o zhes pas na dbyi ba med do //
translated: From the affix, nyan is na, so there is no deletion of the i.

original: du bhrinya 'dzin pa la'o //
analyzed: du bhrinya 'dzin pa la'o //
translated: Dubh is for the holder.

original: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
translated: Jani is for the arising.

original: sva su 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: sva su 'tshe ba la'o //
translated: Su is for the harm.

original: p'a srung ba la'o //
analyzed: p'a srung ba la'o //
translated: [The letter] pa [is for] a protector.

original: nanya sngon du'o //🔽n'i thob pa la'o //
analyzed: nanya sngon du'o // n'i thob pa la'o //
translated: [The letter] na [is for] in front.🔽[The letter] ni [is for] attainment.

original: na'i na'o zhes pas na yig go //
analyzed: na'i na'o zhes pas na yig go //
translated: [The letter] ni [is for] na.

original: tvi sha dga' ba la'o //
analyzed: tvi sha dga' ba la'o //
translated: [The letter] tva [is for] delight.

original: ksha da zhes pa mdo'i byings hu sbyin pa la'o //
analyzed: ksha da zhes pa mdo'i byings hu sbyin pa la'o //
translated: [The letter] kṣa [is for] the verbal root hu, “to give.”

original: p'ung dag par byed pa la'o //🔽nga yig ngita'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
analyzed: p'ung dag par byed pa la'o // nga yig ngita'o zhes pa'i rtags don no //
translated: [The letter] pa [is for] purification.🔽[The letter] ṅa [is for] the meaning of the sign in the word ṅita.

original: sha su rjes su ston pa la'o //
analyzed: sha su rjes su ston pa la'o //
translated: [The letter] śa [is for] instruction.

original: spra sngon du'o //
analyzed: spra sngon du'o //
translated: [The letter] spra [is for] in front.

original: 'di rnams las trin tritsa mthar tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams las trin tritsa mthar tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: From these [letters], the word trīṃ [is formed].

original: na yig rtse yig dag dbyangs kyi don no //
analyzed: na yig rtse yig dag dbyangs kyi don no //
translated: The letter na [is for] the meaning of the vowel [sign] on top.

original: bu aa nang gi ring po nyid sogs kyi bar sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: bu aa nang gi ring po nyid sogs kyi bar sngar bzhin no //
translated: The letter bu [is for] the inner length, and so forth, as before.

original: de la p'a ti'i ai nyid do //
analyzed: de la p'a ti'i ai nyid do //
translated: In that [verse], pa [is for] the very i of pāti.

original: pa pi t'a dza na ka ...(skyid par byed pa la/) byings de nyid kyi ma nyid do //
analyzed: pa pi t'a dza na ka ...(skyid par byed pa la/) byings de nyid kyi ma nyid do //
translated: Pa [is for] the very mother of the verbal root jan, “to delight.”

original: (ma)...m'a t'a (skyed par byed pa la/)...dza na n'i du hi'i aita'o //
analyzed: (ma)...m'a t'a (skyed par byed pa la/)...dza na n'i du hi'i aita'o //
translated: [The letter] ma [is for] the verbal root jan, “to produce.”

original: ta yig shtat bya ba'i don no //
analyzed: ta yig shtat bya ba'i don no //
translated: [The letter] ta [is for] the meaning of action.

original: aat aeng med pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: aat aeng med pa'ang ngo //
translated: [The letter] a [is for] the absence of a.

analyzed: shattri kum dza ra: bh'u p'ung aa di rnams las krina'o //

original: sh'u rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'u rab tu skye ba la'o //

analyzed: nga yig bhi s'ung a'u dit las so zhes pa'i rtags don no //

analyzed: shthi bu dang shvak min pa'i dang po'i sha'i sa'o zhes pas sha yig gi sa yig go //

original: aa da ps'a za ba la'o //
analyzed: aa da ps'a za ba la'o //

original: na yig dbyangs kyi don no //

original: bh'u yod pa la'o //

analyzed: bishta dra bya ;

analyzed: bhi dir 'joms pa la'o //

analyzed: d'ab aishta k'a pa kva mritti k'a pa li pa ti las a'a ka'o //

analyzed: gu pa sbed pa la'o //

analyzed: ai sha 'gro ba la'o //

analyzed: ma dhu ka: briksha dza ti ...(shing gi bye brag) / ba l'u ka: hi pra: dza l'u ka: pr'a na bi she sham ;

original: mri nga'i @88b ai ka'i aata aeng ma ru ka: ma y'u ra: (rma bya/)...ka li'i a'a nyid tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: mri nga'i @88b ai ka'i aata aeng ma ru ka: ma y'u ra: (rma bya/)...ka li'i a'a nyid tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: Mrinai, atikamaruka, mayuraka, kalya.

original: k'a y'u ka: ka la: ma l'u ka: briksha dz'a ti ...(shing gi khyad par/) bha li'i aa nyid do //
analyzed: k'a y'u ka: ka la: ma l'u ka: briksha dz'a ti ...(shing gi khyad par/) bha li'i aa nyid do //
translated: Kayuka, kala, maluka, brikshajati, bhalya.

original: bh'a l'u ka: aatstsha la bha: pa tsi'i aata kyi aa nyid do //
analyzed: bh'a l'u ka: aatstsha la bha: pa tsi'i aata kyi aa nyid do //
translated: Bhaluka, acchalabha, pacya, atikya.

original: pi tsu ka: karp'a sa: ka ts'u ka: sh'a ka dz'a ti: sha mi las kha'o //
analyzed: pi tsu ka: karp'a sa: ka ts'u ka: sh'a ka dz'a ti: sha mi las kha'o //
translated: Picuka, karpasaka, kacuka, sakajati, shamilaka.

original: sha mu da mu nye bar zhi ba la'o //🔽sha mi las sha 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sha mu da mu nye bar zhi ba la'o // sha mi las sha 'gyur ro //
translated: Shamudamunaya.🔽Shamilaka.

original: ha la la ma'i zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
analyzed: ha la la ma'i zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
translated: Halala.

original: yay la rjes su nga ro'i yama'o zhes pas ches nye ba'i nga yig go /
analyzed: yay la rjes su nga ro'i yama'o zhes pas ches nye ba'i nga yig go /
translated: Yayala.

original: (/ dung/)...shangkha: au da chu la 'byung ba kam ssa bha ba: ma ha'i m'u ra yang ngo //
analyzed: (/ dung/)...shangkha: au da chu la 'byung ba kam ssa bha ba: ma ha'i m'u ra yang ngo //
translated: Shankha, udaka, kamasa, bhava, mahima, mura.

original: mu ha rnam par rmongs pa la'o //
analyzed: mu ha rnam par rmongs pa la'o //
translated: muha, to the deluded.

original: 'di las kha 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las kha 'gyur ro //
translated: From this, [the form] becomes kha.

original: mu hi'i mur du bsgyur ba'ang ngo /
analyzed: mu hi'i mur du bsgyur ba'ang ngo /
translated: [The form] muha is also changed to mur.🔽murkha, the deluded.

original: (/ rmongs pa/)...murkha: p'a la:...(byis pa/) sh'i kh'a'o //
analyzed: (/ rmongs pa/)...murkha: p'a la:...(byis pa/) sh'i kh'a'o //
translated: pāla, the childish.

original: shi kha zhes pa'i sgra 'di tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: shi kha zhes pa'i sgra 'di tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: The word śikha is a compound word.

original: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
translated: śaya, to lie down.

original: 'di las kha pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las kha pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From this, [the form] becomes parā.

original: thung ngu nyid kyang tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: thung ngu nyid kyang tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: The short [vowel] a is also a compound word.

original: d'a pa'o // shi kh'a ('bar ba/)...dipti m'u di gri dag las gak ga dag go //
analyzed: d'a pa'o // shi kh'a ('bar ba/)...dipti m'u di gri dag las gak ga dag go //
translated: dāpa, śikha, from diptī and mudgṛī, [the form] kakā.

original: mu da dga' ba la'o //
analyzed: mu da dga' ba la'o //
translated: muda, joy.

original: gr'i nges par gnon pa la'o //
analyzed: gr'i nges par gnon pa la'o //
translated: gari, to oppress.

original: 'di dag las gak ga zhes pa 'di dag pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag las gak ga zhes pa 'di dag pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From these, this kakā becomes parā.

original: ka yig aata aeng 'gegs pa'i don no /
analyzed: ka yig aata aeng 'gegs pa'i don no /
translated: The syllable ka has the meaning of at and aṅga.🔽muñjā, a kind of grain.

original: (/ mon sran rde'u/) ...mungga: ('bru'i khyad par/)...bri hi dz'a ti aa kam gi aata aeng ra pha rol nyid do //
analyzed: (/ mon sran rde'u/) ...mungga: ('bru'i khyad par/)...bri hi dz'a ti aa kam gi aata aeng ra pha rol nyid do //
translated: bṛhijāti, akamgi, at and aṅga, [the form] becomes parā.

original: gargga (drang srong gi bye brag).../ sh'astra bi she sha: pa di las aangga tsa'o //
analyzed: gargga (drang srong gi bye brag).../ sh'astra bi she sha: pa di las aangga tsa'o //
translated: [The word] garga [means] a particular kind of sage.

original: ba t'i ba the 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: ba t'i ba the 'gro ba la'o //
translated: [The word] paṭhī [means] 'to go'.

original: pa ti las aangga tsa 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa ti las aangga tsa 'gyur ro //
translated: From paṭhī, [the word] aṅka is formed.

original: tsa yig dbyangs don no //
analyzed: tsa yig dbyangs don no //
translated: The letter ca [means] 'sound'.

original: pa tang+ga: sha la bha: ga mi las ga na'o //
analyzed: pa tang+ga: sha la bha: ga mi las ga na'o //
translated: [The word] paṭaṅga [means] 'insect'.

original: gamli bri sli 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: gamli bri sli 'gro ba la'o //
translated: [The word] gamya [means] 'to go'.

original: ga mi las gan pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ga mi las gan pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From gamya, [the word] para is formed.

original: na yig dbyangs don no //
analyzed: na yig dbyangs don no //
translated: The letter na [means] 'sound'.

original: dzhal la mtha' ma yin pa'i na'i 'ang ngo zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
analyzed: dzhal la mtha' ma yin pa'i na'i 'ang ngo zhes pas rjes su nga ro'o //
translated: [The word] jhalla [means] 'end' and also 'na' without a final [vowel].

original: yay\ la rjes su nga ro'i yama\'o zhes pas ches nye ba'i nga yig go //
analyzed: yay\ la rjes su nga ro'i yama\'o zhes pas ches nye ba'i nga yig go //
translated: [The word] yayya [means] 'sound' and also 'yam' with a following sound.

original: aa dza la sogs pa dang aata las so zhes pas da pa'o //
analyzed: aa dza la sogs pa dang aata las so zhes pas da pa'o //
translated: [The word] ajja [means] 'today' and also 'at' and so forth.

original: gangg'a (dza h'u'i bu mo/)...dz'a h'u b'i shr'ingga: aangga ;
analyzed: gangg'a (dza h'u'i bu mo/)...dz'a h'u b'i shr'ingga: aangga ;
translated: [The word] gaṅgā [means] 'daughter of Jahnu'.

original: bhringga rnams so //
analyzed: bhringga rnams so //
translated: [The word] bhrṅga [means] 'bee'.

original: sgra 'di rnams gan pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: sgra 'di rnams gan pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: These sounds are to be used as a final particle.

original: @89a * // shr'i 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: @89a * // shr'i 'tshe ba la'o //
translated: [The word] śrī [means] 'harm'.

original: aa gi ra gi la gi 'gro ba'i don la'o //
analyzed: aa gi ra gi la gi 'gro ba'i don la'o //
translated: [The word] agira [means] 'to go'.🔽[The word] giri [means] 'to go'.

original: du bhrinya 'dzin pa la'o //
analyzed: du bhrinya 'dzin pa la'o //
translated: Dhu is for holding.

original: de la shr'i n'a ti'i thung ngu nyid dang nuk kyang ngo //
analyzed: de la shr'i n'a ti'i thung ngu nyid dang nuk kyang ngo //
translated: There, the short ī of śrīṇā is also nuk.

original: au yig brjod don no //
analyzed: au yig brjod don no //
translated: The letter u is for the meaning of expression.

original: ka yig kita bya ba'i don rjes su nga ro sogs sngar bzhin no //🔽shringgam bi sh'a nam aangga'i ga yig dbyi'o //
analyzed: ka yig kita bya ba'i don rjes su nga ro sogs sngar bzhin no // shringgam bi sh'a nam aangga'i ga yig dbyi'o //
translated: The letter ka is for the meaning of action, as before with the anusvāra, and so on.🔽Śṛṅga is for viśāna, and the letter ṅ of aṅga is for body.

original: aangga: (lus/)...sha r'i ram ;🔽bhri nya'i nuka a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: aangga: (lus/)...sha r'i ram ; bhri nya'i nuka a'a ga ma'o //
translated: Aṅga is for śarīra.🔽Bhrū is for nuk, and āgama is for coming.

original: bhringga: bhram ra:...(bung ba/) dra ni las gha'o //
analyzed: bhringga: bhram ra:...(bung ba/) dra ni las gha'o //
translated: Bhrṅga is for bhramar, and dra is for karma.

original: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
translated: Jana is for pra-utpatti, and utpatti is for arising.

original: dza ni las gha pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dza ni las gha pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Jana is for para, and para is for the other side.

original: rjes su nga ro sogs sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: rjes su nga ro sogs sngar bzhin no //
translated: As before, with the anusvāra, and so on.

original: d'aba'o // dzanggh'a bra n'angga: (rdze  ngar  ro/) / ka tsi las tsha'o //
analyzed: d'aba'o // dzanggh'a bra n'angga: (rdze  ngar  ro/) / ka tsi las tsha'o //
translated: Dha is for jaṅghā, and aṅga is for knee.

original: ka tsa 'ching ba la'o //🔽ka tsi las tsha pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ka tsa 'ching ba la'o // ka tsi las tsha pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Ka is for bandhana, and ka is for binding.🔽Ka is for tva, and tva is for the other side.

original: katstsha ...(rtsib logs so/) / p'arshva: sha ka la sogs pa rnams las aata na'o //
analyzed: katstsha ...(rtsib logs so/) / p'arshva: sha ka la sogs pa rnams las aata na'o //
translated: Ka is for tsa, and tsa is for rib.🔽Pa is for ṛṣabha, and ṛṣabha is for strength.

original: sha kli nus pa la'o //
analyzed: sha kli nus pa la'o //
translated: Śa is for śakti, and śakti is for power.

original: aa ka zhes pa mdo'i byings /
analyzed: aa ka zhes pa mdo'i byings /
translated: Aka is for the root of a sūtra.

original: ku la tshogs pa la'o //🔽de bri rtse ba la'o //
analyzed: ku la tshogs pa la'o // de bri rtse ba la'o //
translated: Kula is for a group.🔽Marka is for a scribe.

original: marka zhes pa mdo'i byings /
analyzed: marka zhes pa mdo'i byings /
translated: Mṛka is for a collection.

original: ka mu mdzes pa la'o //
analyzed: ka mu mdzes pa la'o //
translated: Kama is for beauty.

original: 'di lta bu la sogs pa rnams las aatan\ pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di lta bu la sogs pa rnams las aatan\ pha rol tu 'gyur ro //
translated: From such [words] as these, aṭana becomes the equivalent of “other shore.”

original: na yig dbyangs don no //
analyzed: na yig dbyangs don no //
translated: The vowel sign na is for the meaning of “sound.”🔽Śaka is for “to take,” taṃ for “to take,” and haṇaṃ for “to take.”

original: sha ka tam ba ha nam aa ka tam he da nam d'ap\ mang tshig las aata aeng med do //
analyzed: sha ka tam ba ha nam aa ka tam he da nam d'ap\ mang tshig las aata aeng med do //
translated: Aṭa is for “many” and aṅga is for “without.”🔽Kula is for “to bind,” taṃ for “to bind,” and devatā for “sage.”

original: ku la t'a bandha k'i de ba ta (drang srong/)...ri shi: marka ta: b'a na ra: ka ma ta: (drag po/)...ru dra: dza ta: moshta'o //
analyzed: ku la t'a bandha k'i de ba ta (drang srong/)...ri shi: marka ta: b'a na ra: ka ma ta: (drag po/)...ru dra: dza ta: moshta'o //
translated: Rṣi is for “to be beautiful,” markaṭa for “to be a monkey,” and kamata for “to be fierce.”🔽Ruda is for “to cry,” jaṭa for “to be matted,” and moṣṭa for “to be a fist.”

original: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
translated: Jani is for “to be born.”

original: mu ta rnam par dkrug pa la'o //
analyzed: mu ta rnam par dkrug pa la'o //
translated: Mṛta is for “to be shaken.”

original: 'di dag las aa tan pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag las aa tan pha rol tshig phrad du bya'o //
translated: From these [words], aṭana becomes the equivalent of “other shore.”

original: dza ni'i aa yig na yig dag dbyi'o //
analyzed: dza ni'i aa yig na yig dag dbyi'o //
translated: In jani, the a and na are for the sound.

original: dza t'a ...(ral pa /
analyzed: dza t'a ...(ral pa /
translated: Jaṭa is for “to be matted,”🔽“hair tied up,” and kaśa-bandha is for “to be tied.”

original: skra 'chings pa/)...ka sha banda: lu ta'i sha nyid dang aa yig dbyi'o //🔽yang ba mtha' nye'i 'o zhes pas ao nyid do //
analyzed: skra 'chings pa/)...ka sha banda: lu ta'i sha nyid dang aa yig dbyi'o //🔽yang ba mtha' nye'i 'o zhes pas ao nyid do //
translated: Luṭa is for “to be,” and the a is for the sound.
